body_html: Yes, voting for application_id - this will however mean, that last / this season's ratings aren't compatible with the schema any more. But I don't think this should be a problem, the whole process changes over time anyways.
body_text: Yes, voting for application_id - this will however mean, that last / this season's ratings aren't compatible with the schema any more. But I don't think this should be a problem, the whole process changes over time anyways.
body: Yes, voting for `application_id` - this will however mean, that last / this season's ratings aren't compatible with the schema any more. But I don't think this should be a problem, the whole process changes over time anyways.
